title: Futago no Monchhichi
synopsis: Monchichi-chan, the twin sister, loves her twin brother very much. She is a crybaby and always follows her brother. Monchichi-kun, the twin brother, protects his sister. He is a brave adventurer and a fishing champion but sometimes becomes a hasty boy. They enjoy wonderful and mysterious adventures together everyday.
staff: [['Sakurai, Masaaki', ['Script']], ["D'Avena, Cristina", ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Takada, Hiroshi', ['Theme Song Arrangement', ' Theme Song Composition']]]
